text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Aquatic. Summons 8 Bubbles around it or heals them. Bubbles allow non-underground plants to be planted on water and protects them from damage.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)Do not make the mistake of mispronouncing his name, it brings many childhood traumas.

pages.text: $(#25228d)Lets you Plant on water and protects plants.
